enum.name: CatHoleThreadStandard
enum.abstract: Hole Thread Standard It describes the standard to be used for hole threads.

enum.name: CatThreadPolarity
enum.abstract: Thread/Tap Polarity Management It describes the thread polarity.

enum.name: CatThreadSide
enum.abstract: Threading/Tapping side It describes the side of thread/tap.

enum.name: CatThreadStandard
enum.abstract: Thread/Tap Standard It describes the standard to be used for thread/tap.

class.name: Add
class.abstract: Represents the add, or union boolean operation.

class.name: Affinity
class.abstract: Represents the hybrid shape Affinity feature object.

method.name: HybridShape
method.abstract: Gets the underlying HybridShapeAffinity.

method.name: AngularSpacing
method.abstract: Returns the angle between two consecutive copies of a shape along the repartition crown.

method.name: InstanceSpacing
method.abstract: Returns the angle at which the pattern spacing is done for unequal angular spacing mode.

method.name: FunctionalFaces
method.abstract: Returns or sets the functional faces.

method.name: MainDraftAngle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the main draft angle.

method.name: Mode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the draft mode.

method.name: PartingElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the parting element.

method.name: PullingDirection
method.abstract: Returns or sets the pulling direction.

method.name: CurvatureRadius
method.abstract: Returns the Curvature radius.

method.name: FacesToFillet
method.abstract: Returns or sets the faces to fillet.

method.name: FilletRadius
method.abstract: Returns the Fillet radius.

method.name: FunctionalFaces
method.abstract: Returns or sets the functional face.

method.name: PartingElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the parting element.

method.name: RoundRadius
method.abstract: Returns the Round radius.

method.name: RoundRadiusActivation
method.abstract: Returns the AutoFillet RoundRadiusActivation flag (for AutoFillet only).

method.name: SliversAndCracks
method.abstract: Returns or sets the slivers face.

method.name: SupportSurface
method.abstract: Returns or sets the support surface.

class.name: AxisToAxis
class.abstract: Represents the hybrid shape AxisToAxis feature object.

method.name: HybridShape
method.abstract: Gets the underlying HybridShapeAxisToAxis.

class.name: BooleanShape
class.abstract: Represents the shapes based on boolean operations on other shapes.

method.name: SetOperatedObject
method.abstract: Modifies the Second Operand.

method.name: SetOperatingVolume
method.abstract: Swaps the operands.

method.name: Body
method.abstract: Returns the inserted body.

method.name: AddElementToChamfer
method.abstract: Adds a new geometrical element to be chamfered.

method.name: WithdrawElementToChamfer
method.abstract: Withdraws a geometrical element from those to be chamfered.

method.name: Angle
method.abstract: Returns the chamfer angle.

method.name: ElementsToChamfer
method.abstract: Returns the collection of geometrical elements to be chamfered.

method.name: Length1
method.abstract: Returns the chamfer first length.

method.name: Length2
method.abstract: Returns the chamfer second length.

method.name: Mode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the chamfer definition mode.

method.name: Orientation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the chamfer orientation.

method.name: Propagation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the propagation mode of the geometrical elements to be chamfered.

method.name: GetRotationAxis
method.abstract: Returns the rotation axis.

method.name: GetRotationCenter
method.abstract: Returns the rotation center if the user defined it.

method.name: SetInstanceAngularSpacing
method.abstract: Sets the InstanceAngularSpacing.

method.name: SetRotationAxis
method.abstract: Sets the rotation axis.

method.name: SetRotationCenter
method.abstract: Sets the rotation center.

method.name: SetUnequalInstanceNumber
method.abstract: Sets the Instance Number.

method.name: SetUnequalStep
method.abstract: This method is deprecated Sets the UnequalStep.

method.name: AngularDirectionRow
method.abstract: Returns the position of the shape to be copied along the angular direction.

method.name: AngularRepartition
method.abstract: Returns the angular repartition.

method.name: CircularPatternParameters
method.abstract: Returns or sets the circular pattern parameters required to define the pattern.

method.name: RadialAlignment
method.abstract: Returns or sets whether the copied shapes should be rotated or radial aligned with respect to the original one.

method.name: RadialDirectionRow
method.abstract: Returns the position of the shape to be copied along the radial direction.

method.name: RadialRepartition
method.abstract: Returns the radial repartition.

method.name: RotationOrientation
method.abstract: Returns or sets whether the shapes are copied clockwise on the crowns with respect to the rotation axis direction.

class.name: ConstRadEdgeFillet
class.abstract: Represents the edge fillet shape with a constant radius.

method.name: AddObjectToFillet
method.abstract: Adds a new sub-element to be filleted.

method.name: WithdrawObjectToFillet
method.abstract: Withdraws a sub-element from those to be filleted.

method.name: ObjectsToFillet
method.abstract: Returns the collection of reference elements to be filleted.

method.name: Radius
method.abstract: Returns the edge fillet constant radius.

method.name: DraftDomains
method.abstract: Returns the collection of draft domains.

method.name: Mode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the draft mode.

method.name: PartingElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the draft parting element.

method.name: AddFaceToDraft
method.abstract: Adds a face to those to be drafted.

method.name: GetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Returns the draft pulling direction.

method.name: RemoveFaceToDraft
method.abstract: Removes a face from those to be drafted.

method.name: SetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Sets the draft pulling direction.

method.name: SetVolumeSupport
method.abstract: Value the support of draft.

method.name: DraftAngle
method.abstract: Returns the draft angle.

method.name: FacesToDraft
method.abstract: Returns the faces to be drafted.

method.name: MultiselectionMode
method.abstract: Changes the multiselection mode.

method.name: NeutralElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the draft neutral element.

method.name: NeutralPropagationMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the neutral element propagation mode.

method.name: PullingDirectionElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the draft pulling direction element.

class.name: DraftDomains
class.abstract: The collection of draft domains used by the draft shape.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a draft domain using its index or its name from the DraftDomains collection.

class.name: DressUpShape
class.abstract: Represents the shapes built with other shape sub-elements such as faces or edges.

method.name: AddEdgeToKeep
method.abstract: Adds a new edge to keep by the filleting operation.

method.name: WithdrawEdgeToKeep
method.abstract: Withdraws an edge from those kept by a filleting operation.

method.name: EdgePropagation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the edge fillet propagation mode.

method.name: EdgesToKeep
method.abstract: Returns the collection of edges to keep by the edge fillet.

method.name: FirstFace
method.abstract: Returns or sets the first limiting face.

method.name: Radius
method.abstract: Returns the face fillet radius.

method.name: SecondFace
method.abstract: Returns or sets the second limiting face.

method.name: FilletBoundaryRelimitation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the fillet boundary relimitation mode.

method.name: FilletTrimSupport
method.abstract: Returns or sets the fillet Trim Support mode.

method.name: CreateStandardThreadDesignTable
method.abstract: Creates a Standard Thread design table .

method.name: CreateUserStandardDesignTable
method.abstract: Creates a UserStandard Thread design table .

method.name: GetDirection
method.abstract: Returns the hole direction with absolute coordinates.

method.name: GetOrigin
method.abstract: Returns the origin point which the hole is anchored to.

method.name: Reverse
method.abstract: Reverses the hole direction .

method.name: SetDirection
method.abstract: Sets the hole associative direction.

method.name: SetOrigin
method.abstract: Sets the origin point which the hole is anchored to.

method.name: AnchorMode
method.abstract: Returns the hole anchor mode.

method.name: BottomAngle
method.abstract: Returns the hole bottom angle.

method.name: BottomLimit
method.abstract: Returns the bottom limit.

method.name: BottomType
method.abstract: Returns the hole bottom type.

method.name: CounterSunkMode
method.abstract: Returns the mode of a countersunk hole .

method.name: Diameter
method.abstract: Returns the hole diameter.

method.name: HeadAngle
method.abstract: Returns the hole head angle.

method.name: HeadDepth
method.abstract: Returns the hole head depth.

method.name: HeadDiameter
method.abstract: Returns the hole head diameter.

method.name: HoleThreadDescription
method.abstract: Returns the hole thread description parameter.

method.name: ThreadDepth
method.abstract: Returns the hole thread depth.

method.name: ThreadDiameter
method.abstract: Returns the hole thread diameter.

method.name: ThreadPitch
method.abstract: Returns the hole thread pitch.

method.name: ThreadSide
method.abstract: Returns the hole thread side.

method.name: ThreadingMode
method.abstract: Returns the hole threading mode.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns the hole type.

class.name: Limit
class.abstract: Represents the limit of a prism or a hole shape.

method.name: Dimension
method.abstract: Returns or sets the limit dimension.

method.name: LimitMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the limit mode.

method.name: LimitingElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the limiting element.

method.name: Spacing
method.abstract: Returns the distance between two consecutive shapes along the repartition direction.

method.name: HybridShape
method.abstract: Gets the underlying HybridShapeLoft.

method.name: MirroringObject
method.abstract: Returns the mirroring Object.

method.name: MirroringPlane
method.abstract: Returns or sets the mirroring reference plane.

method.name: ActivatePosition
method.abstract: Allows user to activate an instance of the pattern.

method.name: DesactivatePosition
method.abstract: Allows user to desactivate an instance of the pattern.

method.name: ItemToCopy
method.abstract: Returns or sets the shape to be copied.

method.name: RotationAngle
method.abstract: Returns the pattern global rotation angle.

class.name: Prism
class.abstract: Prism-based features in Part Design : base for pad or pocket.

method.name: GetDirection
method.abstract: Returns the prism direction with absolute coordinates.

method.name: ReverseInnerSide
method.abstract: Reverses the prism inner side when the profile is open.

method.name: SetDirection
method.abstract: Sets the prism associative direction.

method.name: DirectionOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the prism direction orientation.

method.name: DirectionType
method.abstract: Returns the prism direction type.

method.name: FirstLimit
method.abstract: Returns the first prism limit (one of the two).

method.name: IsSymmetric
method.abstract: Returns the prism symmetry flag.

method.name: IsThin
method.abstract: Returns the prism thin flag.

method.name: MergeEnd
method.abstract: Returns the prism merge end flag (for thin prism only).

method.name: NeutralFiber
method.abstract: Returns the prism neutral fiber flag (for thin prism only).

method.name: SecondLimit
method.abstract: Returns the second prism limit (one of the two).

method.name: GetFirstDirection
method.abstract: Returns the first repartition direction.

method.name: GetSecondDirection
method.abstract: Returns the second repartition direction.

method.name: SetFirstDirection
method.abstract: Sets the first repartition direction.

method.name: SetInstanceSpacing
method.abstract: Sets the InstanceSpacing.

method.name: SetSecondDirection
method.abstract: Sets the second repartition direction.

method.name: SetUnequalInstanceNumber
method.abstract: Sets the Instance Number.

method.name: FirstDirectionRepartition
method.abstract: Returns the linear repartition along the first direction.

method.name: FirstDirectionRow
method.abstract: Returns the position of the shape to be copied along the first linear direction.

method.name: FirstOrientation
method.abstract: Returns or sets whether the pattern is built towards the first direction orientation.

method.name: FirstRectangularPatternParameters
method.abstract: Returns or sets the rectangular pattern parameters required to define the pattern.

method.name: SecondDirectionRepartition
method.abstract: Returns the linear repartition along the second direction.

method.name: SecondDirectionRow
method.abstract: Returns the position of the shape to be copied along the second linear direction.

method.name: SecondOrientation
method.abstract: Returns or sets whether the pattern is built towards the second direction orientation.

method.name: SecondRectangularPatternParameters
method.abstract: Returns or sets the rectangular pattern parameters required to define the pattern.

class.name: Remove
class.abstract: Represents the remove, or substract boolean operation.

method.name: remove_KeepFace
method.abstract: Removes a face to be Kept.

method.name: remove_RemoveFace
method.abstract: Removes a face to be removed.

method.name: KeepFace
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be Kept.

method.name: KeepFaces
method.abstract: Get the specified faces to be kept.

method.name: Propagation
method.abstract: Get the faces that will be removed.

method.name: RemoveFace
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be removed.

method.name: RemoveFaces
method.abstract: Get the specified faces to be removed.

method.name: InstancesCount
method.abstract: Returns the total number of copied shapes.

method.name: AddRemoveFace
method.abstract: Sets the face to be removed.

method.name: AddSplitPlane
method.abstract: Sets the replacing element.

method.name: DeleteRemoveFace
method.abstract: Remove the face to be removed.

method.name: RemoveFace
method.abstract: Returns the face to be removed.

method.name: SplittingSide
method.abstract: Returns or sets the splitting side .

method.name: FirstAngle
method.abstract: Returns the revolution first angle.

method.name: IsThin
method.abstract: Returns the Revol thin flag.

method.name: MergeEnd
method.abstract: Returns the Revol merge end flag (for thin Revol only).

method.name: NeutralFiber
method.abstract: Returns the Revol neutral fiber flag (for thin Revol only).

method.name: RevoluteAxis
method.abstract: Returns or sets the rotation axis for Revol.

method.name: SecondAngle
method.abstract: Returns the revolution second angle.

class.name: Rotate
class.abstract: Represents the shape rotate feature object.

method.name: Angle
method.abstract: Returns the rotation angle.

method.name: AngleValue
method.abstract: Returns or sets the rotation angle value.

method.name: Axis
method.abstract: Returns or sets the rotation axis.

method.name: HybridShape
method.abstract: Gets the underlying HybridShapeRotate.

method.name: Factor
method.abstract: Returns the scaling factor.

method.name: ScalingReference
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scaling reference element.

method.name: Center
method.abstract: Returns or sets the reference element.

method.name: Ratio
method.abstract: Returns the scaling ratio.

method.name: RatioValue
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scaling ratio value.

method.name: SetVolumeSupport
method.abstract: Sets the volume support for volume sew surface.

method.name: SewingIntersectionMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the sewing mode .

method.name: SewingSide
method.abstract: Returns or sets the sewing side .

class.name: ShapeFactory
class.abstract: Represents the factory for shapes to create all kinds of shapes that may be needed for part design.

method.name: AddNewAdd
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new add operation within the current body.

method.name: AddNewAffinity2
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Affinity feature.

method.name: AddNewAssemble
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new assembly operation within the current body.

method.name: AddNewAutoDraft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid autodraft.

method.name: AddNewAutoFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid autofillet.

method.name: AddNewAxisToAxis2
method.abstract: Creates and returns an AxisToAxis transformation feature.

method.name: AddNewBlend
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Blend feature.

method.name: AddNewChamfer
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new chamfer within the current body.

method.name: AddNewCircPattern
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new circular pattern within the current body.

method.name: AddNewCircPatternofList
method.abstract: V5R8 Only: Creates and returns a new circular pattern within the current body using a list of shapes.

method.name: AddNewCloseSurface
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new CloseSurface feature.

method.name: AddNewDraft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new draft within the current body.

method.name: AddNewGroove
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new groove within the current body.

method.name: AddNewGrooveFromRef
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new groove within the current body.

method.name: AddNewHole
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole within the current shape.

method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewHoleFromRefPoint
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewHoleFromSketch
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewHoleWith2Constraints
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewHoleWithConstraint
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new hole within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewIntersect
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new intersect operation within the current body.

method.name: AddNewLoft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Loft feature.

method.name: AddNewMirror
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new mirror within the current body.

method.name: AddNewPad
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new pad within the current body.

method.name: AddNewPadFromRef
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new pad within the current body.

method.name: AddNewPocket
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new pocket within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewPocketFromRef
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new pocket within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewRectPattern
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new rectangular pattern within the current body.

method.name: AddNewRectPatternofList
method.abstract: V5R8 Only: Creates and returns a new rectangular pattern within the current body using a list of shapes.

method.name: AddNewRemove
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new remove operation within the current body.

method.name: AddNewRemoveFace
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new RemoveFace feature.

method.name: AddNewRemovedBlend
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Removed Blend feature.

method.name: AddNewRemovedLoft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Removed Loft feature.

method.name: AddNewReplaceFace
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Align/ ReplaceFace feature.

method.name: AddNewRib
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new rib within the current body.

method.abstract: Creates and returns a new rib within the current body.

method.name: AddNewScaling
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new scaling within the current body.

method.name: AddNewSewSurface
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new sewing operation within the current body.

method.name: AddNewShaft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new shaft within the current body.

method.name: AddNewShaftFromRef
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new shaft within the current body.

method.name: AddNewShell
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new shell within the current body.

method.name: AddNewSlot
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new slot within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewSlotFromRef
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new slot within the current shape.

method.name: AddNewSolidCombine
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new SolidCombine feature.

method.name: AddNewSolidEdgeFilletWithConstantRadius
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid edge fillet with a constant radius.

method.name: AddNewSolidEdgeFilletWithVaryingRadius
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid edge fillet with a varying radius.

method.name: AddNewSolidFaceFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid face-to-face fillet.

method.name: AddNewSolidTritangentFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new solid tritangent fillet within the current body.

method.name: AddNewSplit
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new split operation within the current body.

method.name: AddNewStiffener

method.name: AddNewStiffenerFromRef

method.abstract: Creates and returns a new surface edge fillet with a constant radius.

method.name: AddNewSurfaceEdgeFilletWithVaryingRadius

method.name: AddNewSurfaceTritangentFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new surface tritangent fillet within the current body.

method.name: AddNewSurfacicAutoFillet
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Surfacic autofillet.

method.abstract: Creates and returns a new thread\tap within the current body.

method.name: AddNewThreadWithRef
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new thread\tap within the current body.

method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Trim operation within the current body.

method.name: AddNewUserPattern
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new user pattern within the current body.

method.name: AddNewVolumeAdd
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Volumic Add feature.

method.name: AddNewVolumeCloseSurface
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new VolumeCloseSurface feature.

method.name: AddNewVolumeIntersect
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Volumic Intersect feature.

method.name: AddNewVolumeRemove
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Volumic Remove feature.

method.name: AddNewVolumeSewSurface
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new volume sewing operation within the current OGS/GS.

method.name: AddNewVolumeShell
method.abstract: Creates and returns a Volumic Shell feature.

method.name: AddNewVolumeThickSurface
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new VolumeThickSurface feature.

method.name: AddNewVolumeThickness
method.abstract: Creates and returns a volume new thickness within the current GS or OGS.

method.name: AddNewVolumeTrim
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new Volume Trim operation within the GS/OGS.

method.name: AddNewVolumicDraft
method.abstract: Creates and returns a new volume draft within the current body.

method.name: AddFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Adds a new face to those to be removed by the shell process.

method.name: AddFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be thicken with different offset values.

method.name: RemoveFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Removes an existing face from those to be thicken with different offset values by the shell process.

method.name: SetVolumeSupport
method.abstract: Set the Support Volume of the faces to modify during Shell operation.

method.name: WithdrawFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Withdraws an existing face from those to be removed by the shell process.

method.name: ExternalThickness
method.abstract: Returns the shell external thickness.

method.name: FacesToRemove
method.abstract: Returns the collection of faces to be removed by the shell process.

method.name: InternalThickness
method.abstract: Returns the shell internal thickness.

class.name: SketchBasedShape
class.abstract: Represents the shapes based on sketched 2D geometry.

method.name: SetProfileElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets a profile element.

method.name: Sketch
method.abstract: Returns the sketch the shape is based on.

class.name: SolidCombine
class.abstract: The interface to access a CATIASolidCombine.

method.name: FirstComponentDirection
method.abstract: Returns or sets the direction of first component of SolidCombine.

method.name: FirstComponentProfile
method.abstract: Returns or sets the profile of first component of SolidCombine.

method.name: SecondComponentDirection
method.abstract: Returns or sets the direction of second component of SolidCombine.

method.name: SecondComponentProfile
method.abstract: Returns or sets the profile of second component of SolidCombine.

method.name: SplittingSide
method.abstract: Returns or sets the splitting side .

method.name: ReverseDepth
method.abstract: Reverses the stiffener direction.

method.name: ReverseThickness
method.abstract: Reverses the stiffener thickness direction.

method.name: IsFromTop
method.abstract: Returns or sets whether the stiffener is From Side or From Top.

method.name: IsSymmetric
method.abstract: Returns or sets whether the stiffener is symmetric.

method.name: Thickness
method.abstract: Returns the stiffener thickness.

method.name: ThicknessFromTop
method.abstract: Returns the stiffener thickness top in case of From Top stiffener.

class.name: SurfaceBasedShape
class.abstract: Represents the shapes based on Surface.

method.name: Surface
method.abstract: Returns or sets the surface.

method.name: SetKeepAngleOption
method.abstract: Actives KeepAngleOption.

method.name: AnchorDirReverse
method.abstract: Returns the Sweep AnchorDirReverse flag (for Sweep Move Profile only).

method.name: CenterCurve
method.abstract: Returns the sketch used as the sweep center curve.

method.name: CenterCurveElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the center curve .

method.name: IsThin
method.abstract: Returns the Sweep thin flag.

method.name: MergeEnd
method.abstract: Returns the Sweep merge end flag (for thin Sweep only).

method.name: MergeMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the end mode .

method.name: MoveProfileToPath
method.abstract: Returns the Sweep MoveProfileToPath flag (for Sweep Move Profile only).

method.name: NeutralFiber
method.abstract: Returns the Sweep neutral fiber flag (for thin Sweep only).

method.name: NormalAxisDirReverse
method.abstract: Returns the Sweep NormalAxisDirReverse flag (for Sweep Move Profile only).

method.name: PullingDirElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the pulling direction .

method.name: ReferenceSurfaceElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the reference surface .

class.name: Symmetry
class.abstract: Represents the shape symmetry feature object.

method.name: HybridShape
method.abstract: Gets the underlying HybridShapeSymmetry.

method.name: swap_OffsetSide
method.abstract: Swap the side of the offset.

method.name: BotOffset
method.abstract: Returns the value of the bottom offset.

method.name: OffsetSide
method.abstract: Returns the offset direction (defines in regards of the normal direction) .

method.name: TopOffset
method.abstract: Returns the value of the top offset.

method.name: AddFaceToThicken
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be thickened.

method.name: AddFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Adds a new face to thicken with a different offset value.

method.name: RemoveFaceWithDifferentThickness
method.abstract: Removes an existing thickened face.

method.name: SetVolumeSupport
method.abstract: Set support of Thickness feature.

method.name: WithdrawFaceToThicken
method.abstract: Withdraws an existing thickened face.

method.name: FacesToThicken
method.abstract: Returns the collection of faces to be thickened.

method.name: Offset
method.abstract: Returns the thickness offset.

method.name: CreateStandardThreadDesignTable
method.abstract: Creates a Standard Thread design table .

method.name: CreateUserStandardDesignTable
method.abstract: Creates a UserStandard Thread design table .

method.name: ReverseDirection
method.abstract: Swap the direction of the thread or the tap.

method.name: SetExplicitPolarity
method.abstract: Sets the thread polarity explicit.

method.name: Depth
method.abstract: Returns the thread/tap depth.

method.name: Diameter
method.abstract: Returns the thread/tap diameter.

method.name: LateralFaceElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the lateral face (must be cylindrical) .

method.name: LimitFaceElement
method.abstract: Returns or sets the limit face (must be planar ) .

method.name: Pitch
method.abstract: Returns the thread/tap pitch.

method.name: Side
method.abstract: Returns the thread or tap side.

method.name: ThreadDescription
method.abstract: Returns the thread/tap description parameter.

class.name: TransformationShape
class.abstract: Represents the shapes based on a transformation of another shape.

class.name: Translate
class.abstract: Represents the hybrid shape translate feature object.

method.name: HybridShape
method.abstract: Gets the underlying HybridShapeTranslate.

class.name: Trim
class.abstract: Represents the Trim, or union trim boolean operation.

method.name: AddFaceToKeep
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be kept (if face is not divided by operation).

method.name: AddFaceToKeep2
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be kept (if face is divided by operation).

method.name: AddFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be Removed (if face not divided by operation).

method.name: AddFaceToRemove2
method.abstract: Adds a new face to be Removed (if face is divided by operation).

method.name: WithdrawFaceToKeep
method.abstract: Withdraws an existing Kept face (if face is not divided by operation) .

method.name: WithdrawFaceToKeep2
method.abstract: Withdraws an existing Kept face (if face is divided by operation).

method.name: WithdrawFaceToRemove
method.abstract: Withdraws an existing Removed face (if face not divided by operation).

method.name: WithdrawFaceToRemove2
method.abstract: Withdraws an existing Removed face (if face is divided by operation).

method.name: FaceToRemove
method.abstract: Returns the face to be removed by the tritangent fillet.

method.name: FirstFace
method.abstract: Returns the first face limiting the tritangent fillet.

method.name: SecondFace
method.abstract: Returns the second face limiting the tritangent fillet.

method.name: AddFeatureToLocatePositions
method.abstract: Adds a new feature to locate instances.

method.name: AnchorPoint
method.abstract: Returns the anchor point of the user pattern.

method.name: FeatureToLocatePositions
method.abstract: Returns the collection of feature to locate instances.

method.name: AddFeatureToLocatePositions
method.abstract: Adds a new feature to locate instances.

method.name: FeatureToLocatePositions
method.abstract: Returns the collection of feature to locate instances.

class.name: VarRadEdgeFillet
class.abstract: Represents the edge fillet shape with a variable radius.

method.name: AddEdgeToFillet
method.abstract: Adds a new edge to the variable radius edge fillet.

method.name: AddImposedVertex
method.abstract: Adds a new control couple.

method.name: ImposedVertexRadius
method.abstract: Returns the fillet radius on an imposed vertex.

method.name: WithdrawEdgeToFillet
method.abstract: Withdraws an edge from the variable radius edge fillet.

method.name: WithdrawImposedVertex
method.abstract: Withdraws a control couple.

method.name: BitangencyType
method.abstract: Returns or set the fillet bitangency type.

method.name: EdgesToFillet
method.abstract: Returns the collection of edges to be filleted.

method.name: FilletSpine
method.abstract: Returns or set the spine for circle bitangency fillet.

method.name: FilletVariation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the edge fillet radius variation mode.

method.name: ImposedVertices
method.abstract: Returns the collection of vertices where a radius has been imposed.
